text: Amite County is a county in the U.S. state of Mississippi on the southern border with Louisiana. As of the 2020 census, 12,720 people lived there. Its county seat is Liberty. The county is named after the Amite River which runs through the county. It was founded in 1809. == References == Category:1800s establishments in Mississippi Territory Category:1809 establishments in the United States Category:Mississippi counties
title: Amite County, Mississippi
